system.description:
Effect: The user takes 40% less damage from super effective attacks. As part of a Downtime Action, the user can fuse or unfuse with Lunala or Solgaleo to change Formes.

Passive: If the user is fused with Lunala, they possess Cosmic Eclipse as an Extra Ability, and if the user is fused with Solgaleo, they possess Cosmic Luminance as an Extra Ability. When the user undergoes Ultra Burst and changes Formes, this Ability is replaced with Blinding One.
